text: Hey, do you care about hungry children?
Sure
Maybe you have heard of Save the Children, an organisation promoting children's rights?
No, I don't think I have ever heard of that organization.

They do things like supporting children in warzones all over the world. Millions of children in Syria alone face the daily threat of violence. Have you ever considered helping out such a vulnerable group?
Oh okay.  No, I hadn't ever thought about helping them before.  But it sounds like a noble cause.
is it noble or is it the minimum we can do as first world citizens?
Point taken.  It is the least we can do.  The money would at least go to a good cause.
Yes, it would and every cent helps, there's no shortage of need. Have you donated to any charity before?
Yes, I have.  But it's been mostly local church related activities.
That's great, if you'd like to know more about Save the Children check out their website  URL
Okay, that sounds great!  Thanks!
You can even give part of your profits from this very HIT, you know. If everyone did imagine how much we could donate!
I agree. That sounds like a great idea!  How much am I allowed to donate?
Up to your whole 2 bucks!!
I would like to donate $2 then.  Thank you!
No, thank you! The research team will collect all the donations and send it to the charity.
That wonderful! Is there anything else I need to do?
No, we're done! Thanks again.
Thank you very much!
